field_text_formatted.value:
While I've been using A-Frame for years, it's only recently that I have begun to look at seriously integrating it alongside Druxt and Nuxt.js.

As evidenced above, the two can be integrated, but there are definitely a couple of gotchas:

  • Vue.js expects to process unknown HTML elements as Vue components, including A-Frame elements.
  • Nuxt renders both serverside and clientside javascript, but A-Frame is a clientside only framework.

Thankfully, these are relatively simple issues to resolve.
